import React from 'react' import Loading from './Loading' import { faChevronRight } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { faChevronLeft } from '@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import { bulmaCarousel } from 'bulma-extensions' class FunEvents extends React.Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { isLoading: true, funEvents: [] } } componentDidMount() { fetch('/json/fun-events.json') .then(res => { if (res.status === 200) return res.json() return [] }) .then(json => { this.setState({ funEvents: json, isLoading: false }) }) .catch(err => { console.log(err) }) } render() { const { isLoading, funEvents } = this.state return isLoading ? ( ) : ( funEvents.map(funEvent => { return }) ) } } /** * Single Fun Event UI Component * @param {*} props */ const FunEvent = props => { const { data } = props return (
) } var carousels = bulmaCarousel.attach() // carousels now contains an array of all Carousel instances export default FunEvents
